name: Cook the Book: Potatoes Byron
description: As Serious Eats reader Jasmine D. pointed out, it's National Vegetarian Awareness month, and to give a nod to our veg-eating friends, we'll start out this week's Cook the Book with James Beard's Potatoes Byron recipe. In the section of...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 to 3/4 cup coarsely grated Swiss to Gruyère cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Put in an 8- or 9-inch round glass baking dish or pie dish, pour over the heavy cream, and leave for 30 to 45 minutes so the potatoes absorb the cream, butter, and seasonings.
